newsitem.title: UK: Commodity Fund conference for Venezuela.
newsitem.headline: Commodity Fund conference for Venezuela.

text.p: The Common Fund for Commodities is to hold a major conference on 'Commodity Development in Latin America and the Caribbean Region' in September.

The intergovernmental commodity project financing organization said in a press release that the conference will address the problems of the main commodities produced in and exported from Latin America and the Caribbean, and possible solutions identified.
Attendees will include commodity producers, traders, the financial sector, Governments and other groups involved in commodities.
It will be held from September 15 to 18 with assistance from Sistema Economico Latinoamericano (SELA), the release said.
